response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, we're confident it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its worth to you, we propose a price of $110 for this exceptional item. We believe this offers a fair compromise between the value you see in it and our pricing strategy. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 110}
